response.overview: Mike's drum-cam footage from Neal Morse's US Momentum Tour.  Recorded live October 11th, 2012 at the High Line Ballroom in New York.  Tracklisting: 1. Momentum 2. Weathering Sky 3. Author of Confusion 4. The Distance to the Sun 5. Testimony Suite Sleeping Jesus Price of the Power of the Air The Promise Wasted Life 6. Thoughts Part 5 7. The Conflict 8. Question Mark Suite The Temple of the Living God Another World Entrance Inside His Presence 9. Fly High 10. World Without End 11. Sing it High 12. King Jesus  Audio Options include: Full Band and Isolated Drums.
response.title: Mike Portnoy: Live Momentum
